definition: to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
semifeudal and semicolonial (the official Marxist description of China in the late Qing and under the Guomindang)
pinyin: ban4 feng1 jian4 ban4 zhi2 min2 di4

sentences.english: The people's war has helped crush the feudal structure in the rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 人民战争摧毁了农村地区的封建制度。

sentences.english: During the construction of socialistic new villages, people always confuse religion with feudal superstition.
sentences.chinese: 在农村中，人们往往把宗教与封建迷信联系在一起。

sentences.english: Market economy was in its embryonic stages as early as feudalist society.
sentences.chinese: 市场经济，在封建社会时期就有了萌芽。

sentences.english: But it was also a bold attack on feudalism and arranged marriage.
sentences.chinese: 但它同时也是对封建制度和包办婚姻的一记猛击。

sentences.english: The hulk of feudalism will not quickly fade away.
sentences.chinese: 封建主义的残余不会很快消失。

sentences.english: In feudal society, the dragon also be regarded as a symbol of the emperor.
sentences.chinese: 在封建社会，龙更被视作帝王的象征。

sentences.english: They are the hieroglyphics of feudalism succeeding those of theocracy .
sentences.chinese: 这是继神权政治象形文字之后的封建制度象形文字。

sentences.english: This feudal society, beginning with Zhou and Qin Dynasties. lasted about 3000 years.
sentences.chinese: 这个封建社会，从周秦开始，延续了约三千年。

sentences.english: 《Robber 》reflected the youth revolting the feudalism system.
sentences.chinese: 《强盗》反映了青年人对封建专制制度的反抗。

sentences.english: Qin extinguishes six countries, has founded the unprecedented formidable centralization feudal empire.
sentences.chinese: 秦灭六国，建立了空前强大的中央集权的封建帝国。

sentences.english: The"accept and hide"system is a very important legal system in China.
sentences.chinese: 容隐制度是我国封建社会的一项重要法律制度。

sentences.english: I wish deep home firmly feudal autocratic parents and feudal thinking of marriage.
sentences.chinese: 祝家深厚牢固的封建家长专制和封建婚姻思想。

sentences.english: I wish deep home firmly feudal autocratic parents and feudal thinking of marriage.
sentences.chinese: 祝家深厚牢固的封建家长专制和封建婚姻思想。

sentences.english: Their victims from the feudal system, become the accomplices of the feudal rulers.
sentences.chinese: 她们由封建制度的受害者，变成封建统治者的帮凶。

sentences.english: Their victims from the feudal system, become the accomplices of the feudal rulers.
sentences.chinese: 她们由封建制度的受害者，变成封建统治者的帮凶。

definition: to regard men as superior to women (idiom)

three principles and five virtues (idiom)/the three rules (ruler guides subject, father guides son and husband guides wife) and five constant virtues of Confucianism (benevolence 仁, righteousness 義|义, propriety 禮|礼, wisdom 智 and fidelity 信)
forced marriage/arranged marriage (without the consent of the individuals)
